alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 3:50AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT RHEA...SOUTHWESTERN LOUDON... MEIGS...CENTRAL BLEDSOE...MCMINN...NORTHWESTERN MONROE...NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON AND SOUTHERN ROANE COUNTIES THROUGH 545 AM EDT/445 AM CDT/... At 450 AM EDT/350 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Spring City to near Dayton to 7 miles north of Soddy-Daisy. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Lenoir City, Dayton, Sweetwater, Loudon, Madisonville, Decatur, Etowah, Spring City, and Englewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane
